choose.when: mountain_no in (SELECT no FROM mountain WHERE mname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR mloc LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')

mapper.select:
SELECT no, mountain_no, rname, rloc, contact, menu, description, filename, likecnt, dislikecnt, mname, likeClick, dislikeClick FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY no DESC) rn, rv.no, rv.mountain_no, rv.rname, rv.rloc, rv.contact, rv.menu, rv.description, rv.likecnt, rv.filename, rv.mname, rv.dislikecnt, nvl(rl.likeno, 0) likeClick, nvl(rl.dislikeno, 0) dislikeClick FROM (SELECT r.no, r.mountain_no, r.rloc, r.rname, r.contact, r.menu, r.filename, m.mname, r.description, r.likecnt, r.dislikecnt FROM restaurant r, mountain m WHERE r.mountain_no = m.no) rv, (SELECT resno, userno, likeno, dislikeno FROM res_like WHERE userno = #{userno, jdbcType=NUMERIC }) rl WHERE rv.no = rl.resno(+)
mountain_no in (SELECT no FROM mountain WHERE mname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR mloc LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%')
rname LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
rloc LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
menu LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
description LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNo} -1) * #{amount} + 1 AND #{pageNo} * #{amount}

SELECT no, mountain_no, rname, rloc, contact, menu, description, filename, likecnt, dislikecnt, mname FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY no DESC) rn, no, mountain_no, rname, rloc, contact, menu, description, filename, likecnt, dislikecnt, mname FROM res_view) WHERE no = #{no}
